In general dealer stock can be unregistered for a while
i forgot the rules  can PI import NEW cars?
You can import your own self too
yes anyone can import. challenge is finding a workshop
if the amount is not big like in malayia  can take such risk
Not really  you can just go to any specialist

Or better still  some import car but not registered to drive on sg roads
this i know. of course the outside one will take whatever. it is business to them
So the cost of ownerships is definitely lower
the dealer wont want to service your car
Depending on your worth i guess.
in malaysia  recon cars can be serviced by dealers. they dont care you dont buy from them
many diret import cars from japan are as good as new.
the only problem in malayisa is you cannot do it yourself to import
you got to find a licensed importer with a AP
Can go to the AD also
For them it is business  they will just make you pay the full price no free service
Got money anything also can as long no crimes involved. ğŸ˜
they wont want to entertain at all
and would specify ridiculous price just so hat you cannot accuse them for not doing your car. this is how they deter you
in malaysia  some dealers like Autobavaria (BMW top dealer) would charge rm20K to open "account". while 2nd tier dealers would not mind
Not too different  usually for ICE cars they can still work on them
Main differences can be the language that the obd reads in originally but that can be changed. Mechanically most of them are the same or similar
They do actually  take a PI Mercedes to c&c  they will be happy to service. Of course at a cost
Just that they will not offer their 10 year engine & gearbox warranty which is only offered if you buy and service with them
you are not treated equal. i already said they will charge you HIGH just aso you cannot complain to principle
they ill quote you so high you wont want to do it
Actually roughly the same price  they will just charge a bit more for scanning and may try to add on some more repairs hoping you don't see or don't understand
You're definitely not treated equal and why would you be? You're not paying them their agent mark up after all
no no. you are paying them service fees regardless whether you buy from them or not.  this is service department costs.  not from their sales department.

But many PIs nowadays will offer their own workshops and warranties  very common because of the c&c 10 year warranty. Cars and coffee  jack cars  etc. will offer a similar warranty as long as you service with them
Agreed  but it's a business as a whole mah  they won't treat you the same so that next time you think of buying from them for end to end solution. Save money must deal with stuff like this
what if you import your own?
Still similar  either go to the AD and do  they will treat you the same as any other dealer PI or you go outside

Most people buying PI cars or importing themselves will not want to go to the AD anyway as in majority of their cases the aim is to save money  the savings continue by going for repairs outside which are much cheaper
